english.segment1: You're Here. In My Heart. You're the Light. That Guides Me Through The Dark
english.segment2: You Walk Beside Me. The Night Seems Cold. Each Time I Fall. Your Arms Are There To Hold
english.segment3: Chorus: You Walk Beside Me. Giving Strength I've Never Known. I Am Not Alone. You Walk Beside Me
english.segment4: You're Here. In My Mind. I talk To You. And All My Fears Unwind. I Know I'm Loved For who I am. You Make Me Wanna Be The Best I can
english.segment6: And I rely on your patience. When I face the unknown. and because of you. I am not alone
english.segment7: In the sun, In the rain. Through the good times and the pain. I reach out for your hand. I know that you understand
